ServiceWorkerPostMessage.summary: The postMessage() method of the interface sends a message to the worker. This accepts a single parameter, which is the data to send to the worker. The data may be any JavaScript object which can be handled by the structured clone algorithm.

remarks.para: The service worker can send back information to its clients by using the method. The message will not be sent back to this ServiceWorker object but to the associated available via .

-The interface it belongs to.
-Its counterpart, the method that a service worker must use to send a message back to the associated .
